title: Bureau Grot: Need good (student) pricing or look-alike
content:
Hello,

The last web edition of Before & After had a nice layout using Bureau Grot Extra Compressed Black, a font that would work well with a current project. However, the going rate (5 fonts for $175) is a bit beyond my reach, and I can’t pass the cost along because the piece is pro bono. Is there a cheaper alternative for either the specified font or a viable alternative?

Thanks.

author: ho72

comments.content: The going rate is actually [$40 per weight](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907014803/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/bureau_grot_extra_compressed_black/) and FontShop (like others) offers a student discount of 10%. Contact them.

Stephen —

Clarification: The going rate for FB fonts is $40 per weight _for singles_ and _through resellers_.

Font Bureau’s own direct Retail site gives quantity discounts. So at 35 styles the per font cost goes down to $35 (thus the $175 rate quoted above), and 6 or more styles drop to $30 per. Further discounts above 16 styles.

These are the single workstation rates, and styles may be mixed across families.

(More info at [http://www.fontbureau.com/help/quickpricingchart](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907014803/http:/www.fontbureau.com/help/quickpricingchart "http://www.fontbureau.com/help/quickpricingchart"))

— K.
Indeed, thanks for the bulk discount reminder.
